# Deconversion
When mounting an effort to thwart the [color=#4cabb3]Cosmic Cult[/color], there are several methods the crew might employ to ensure their survival and safety. One of these methods is [color=Yellow]Deconversion[/color].
To [color=Yellow]Deconvert[/color] a cosmic cultist, an [bold]Ardent Censer[/bold] must be used. Censers are fueled with Mindbreaker Toxin, which can be produced in chemical labs.
Be careful, though! Some cultists may be powerful enough to endure a deconversion attempt once. If an attempt to cleanse one's mind results in a burst of malign energy, wait until they stop shaking, then repeat the process again.
## Suppression Methods
Deconversion is but one method for dealing with an encroaching cult. Crew aboard the station may alternatively wish to invest in [color=Green]Mindshield[/color] implanters.
These state-of-the-art devices can prevent outside influences from brainwashing crewmembers, providing a powerful utility against the cult's influence.
The [color=Yellow]Chaplain[/color] and [color=Yellow]Mystagogue[/color]'s noospheric attuning renders them immune to nearly all of the cosmic cult's powers.
